description.value: You and your spotter are adept at watching out for one another. As long as you can see or hear each other, neither of you is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Flat-Footed] to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden], undetected, or flanking creatures of your level or lower, or to creatures of your level or lower using a surprise attack. However, they can still help their allies flank.
